p.d: Following the everyday lives of residents in Mistral, a working-class neighbourhood in Marseille, with all their joys and heartbreak, dramatic stories of love and hate, and the secrets lurking round the corner. With: Michel Cordes (Roland), Sylvie Flepp (Mirta), Cécilia Hornus (Blanche), Serge Dupire (Vincent), Rebecca Hampton (Céline), Virgile Bayle (Guillaume), Anne Decis (Luna), Laetitia Milot (Mélanie), Laurent Kerusore (Thomas), Alexandre Fabre (Frémont), David BaIot (Djawad), Élodie Varlet (Estelle) Genre : comedy drama
